name: SFMTA: SF Paratransit
description: Multiple transit options including vans, taxis, and shuttles
fullDescription: SF Paratransit provides door-to-door transportation for San Francisco residents who are unable to use Muni due to a disability. Services include van rides, taxi vouchers, and group van service.
whatTheyOffer:
- SF Access van service (shared-ride, door-to-door)
- Taxi program with discounted vouchers
- Group Van service for regular trips
- Shop-a-Round shuttle for grocery shopping
- Personal care attendants ride free
howToGetIt:
1. Complete the SF Paratransit eligibility application
2. Applications available online or at SFMTA offices
3. Functional assessment may be required
4. Choose service options based on your needs
5. Schedule rides by phone or through the app
